scripts.export: mkdir -p resume && npm run export:ja && npm run export:en
scripts.export:ja: resume export resume/resume-ja.pdf --resume resume.json --theme jsonresume-theme-paper && resume export resume/index.html --resume resume.json --theme jsonresume-theme-paper
scripts.export:en: resume export resume/resume-en.pdf --resume resume-en.json --theme jsonresume-theme-paper && resume export resume/resume-en.html --resume resume-en.json --theme jsonresume-theme-paper
